name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Hody's 'Nothing' Revelation
keyMoments.description: The shocking truth about Hody is broadcast across Fish-Man Island: when asked what humans did to him to cause his hatred, he answered 'Nothing.' His hatred has no personal foundation.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Hody as a monster born purely from environmental hatred in the Fish-Man District, with no actual personal grievances against humans. This is the core revelation of his character.

keyMoments.title: Hody Charges in Rage
keyMoments.description: After his true nature is exposed to all of Fish-Man Island, Hody charges maniacally at Luffy and Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hody's violent reaction to having his emptiness exposed publicly.

reveals.information: Has never been personally wronged by humans - answered 'Nothing' when asked what they did to him
His hatred is purely inherited from the environment of the Fish-Man District, not based on personal experience

keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi Broadcasts Hody's Truth
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi broadcasts the truth about Hody Jones to all of Fish-Man Island, revealing his conversation where Hody admitted 'Nothing' was done to him by humans.
keyMoments.significance: Takes the initiative to expose the New Fish-Man Pirates' ideological emptiness to the entire island, helping to delegitimize their cause.

keyMoments.title: Explains the New Fish-Man Pirates' True Nature
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi explains in his broadcast that the New Fish-Man Pirates are empty beings who perpetuate hatred because they fear it will fade.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial context about generational hatred and the cycle of prejudice on Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Robin Defeats Hammond with Doble Clutch
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her new post-timeskip technique 'Doble Clutch' to defeat Hammond and destroy his slave tank, freeing the enslaved humans inside.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's improved combat abilities after the timeskip and liberates humans who then join the fight.

abilities.description: Robin creates multiple arms to grab and defeat opponents with a powerful clutch technique.

keyMoments.title: Goads Wadatsumi to Mega Monk Form
keyMoments.description: Sanji uses psychological tactics to goad Wadatsumi into expanding to his massive Mega Monk form by comparing him unfavorably to Surume.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's tactical fighting style and ability to manipulate opponents psychologically.

keyMoments.title: Continues Battle with Wadatsumi
keyMoments.description: Jinbe continues fighting Wadatsumi alongside Sanji as the giant fish-man transforms into his Mega Monk form.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's ongoing support in the battle at Gyoncorde Plaza.

keyMoments.title: Requests Robin Free the Enslaved Humans
keyMoments.description: Jinbe asks Robin to free the enslaved humans in Hammond's tank.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jinbe's strategic thinking and concern for the enslaved humans.

keyMoments.title: Mega Nyudo (Mega Monk) Transformation
keyMoments.description: Wadatsumi transforms into his Mega Nyudo form by inhaling massive amounts of air and expanding to enormous proportions, crushing allies in the process.
keyMoments.significance: First use of Wadatsumi's signature expansion technique in combat.

abilities.description: Wadatsumi inhales massive amounts of air and expands his body to enormous proportions, crushing anything in his vicinity.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Robin's Doble Clutch
keyMoments.description: Hammond is defeated by Nico Robin using her Doble Clutch technique, and his slave tank is destroyed, freeing the enslaved humans.
keyMoments.significance: Hammond's defeat marks the liberation of enslaved humans who then join the fight against the New Fish-Man Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Understands Hody's True Nature
keyMoments.description: After learning about Hody's 'Nothing' response, Luffy accurately describes Hody as 'a monster born from their environment.'
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's ability to understand the complexity of the situation and articulate it simply.
keyMoments.quote: He's a monster born from their environment.

keyMoments.title: Cryptic Comment About Noah
keyMoments.description: Neptune makes a cryptic comment that if Noah hits the island, 'it would be just as it was written,' hinting at prophecies.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the deeper historical significance of Noah related to Joy Boy and ancient prophecies.
keyMoments.quote: If Noah hits the island, it would be just as it was written.

reveals.information: Possesses knowledge of prophecies or ancient writings related to Noah's significance
